dialogue_turns.speaker: Foreign listener email
dialogue_turns.text: Car Enthusiast from Almaty" writes, "I'm fascinated by the growth of car ownership in our country. What are the latest numbers?"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Car Enthusiast from Almaty writes, I'm fascinated by the growth of car ownership in our country. What are the latest numbers?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's vehicle fleet is now almost 5.94 million units as of April 1st.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's vehicle fleet is now almost five point nine four million units as of April first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As of April 1, the vehicle fleet in Kazakhstan totaled almost 5.94 million units.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's a huge jump—nearly a 10 percent increase from last year, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a huge jump-nearly a ten percent increase from last year, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is a 9.8 percent increase compared to last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, 9.8 percent. And get this, over 5.2 million of those are passenger cars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, nine point eight percent. And get this, over five point two million of those are passenger cars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The majority are passenger cars " 5,235,343 units, or about 88 percent of the total.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So like, 88 percent of the total fleet. But where's this growth happening the most?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So like, eighty eight percent of the total fleet. But where's this growth happening the most?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The majority are passenger cars " 5,235,343 units, or about 88 percent of the total.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Abai region saw an insane surge—over 50 percent growth, um, bringing their total to 73,000 cars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Abai region saw an insane surge-over fifty percent growth, um, bringing their total to seventy three thousand cars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Most vehicles were registered in the Abai region, where the number rose by 50.6 percent to 73,138 cars.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's massive. And other regions like Zhetysu and Turkestan also had over 30 percent increases.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's massive. And other regions like Zhetysu and Turkestan also had over thirty percent increases.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A growth of over 30 percent was also recorded in the Zhetysu, Ulytau, and Turkestan regions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's not just one area—it's a nationwide trend. In March alone, more than 147,000 new vehicles were registered.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's not just one area-it's a nationwide trend. In March alone, more than one hundred forty seven thousand new vehicles were registered.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In March, more than 147,000 vehicles were registered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, uh, 3.5 percent higher than March of last year. And most of those were passenger cars again?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, uh, three point five percent higher than March of last year. And most of those were passenger cars again?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In March 2025, a total of 147,021 vehicles were registered in Kazakhstan, which is 3.5 percent more than in March last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, 133,481 of them. The Bureau of National Statistics has been tracking this closely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, one hundred thirty three thousand, four hundred eighty one of them. The Bureau of National Statistics has been tracking this closely.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting because they also reported that back in February, the year-over-year growth was even higher—over 107 percent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting because they also reported that back in February, the year-over-year growth was even higher-over one hundred seven percent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, the Bureau of National Statistics reported that the number of motor vehicles as of February 1, 2025, has increased by 107.6% compared to February of the previous year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, which suggests the pace might be slowing just a bit, but still, the overall trend is way up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, which suggests the pace might be slowing just a bit, but still, the overall trend is way up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely makes you think about infrastructure, traffic, all of that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely makes you think about infrastructure, traffic, all of that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Thanks for the question, Car Enthusiast from Almaty!
